channel.title: git on My Universe
channel.description: Recent content in git on My Universe

item.title: GitFlow Groundhog Day
item.description: Yes, this is all over again the old discussion about what’s the best branching model for projects using Git as their version control system. I know, there are countless blog posts (e. g. 1, 2, or 3) about that topic out there… yet, I feel most of the discussion is focused on projects with continuous deployment (i. e. mostly web applications), whereas classical desktop software with classical release cycles are rather underrepresented.
